container1.heading: Who we are
container1.subtitle: Hosting HQ is a newly developed full-stack hosting provider, established in 2021
container1.paragraph: With the idea of community based hosting, everything that goes into Hosting HQ is designed around the community. Want a host that will be there for you through all of your projects? Choose Hosting HQ.

container2.heading: What we offer
container2.subtitle: We offer full-stack hosting options for projects of all sizes.
container2.paragraph: Supporting JavaScript, Java, Python2, Python3 as well as HTML and CSS through modules. Whether you are a new developer or an experienced one, we provide peace of mind no matter your project.

a11y.fraudlabs: FraudLabs Pro Prevents Fraud for Digital Businesses

footer.eoe: Hosting HQ LLC is an Equal Opportunity Employer and Prohibits Discrimination and Harassment of Any Kind

container1.heading: Support
container1.subtitle: Our support team is a vital part of our service, the backbone of the customer experience
container1.paragraph: Applicants seeking a support position with us should have the following qualifications and experience
container1.sub1: Basic knowledge of JavaScript and/or Python (required)
container1.sub2: Basic experience in a customer service or other support related role (preferred)
container1.sub3: Basic understanding of Secure Shell Protocol (required)
container1.sub4: Access to a computer with a strong internet connection (required)
container1.sub5: Be at least 16 years of age or older (required)

container2.heading: Sales
container2.subtitle: Our sales team is many times the first interaction the customer has with us, paving the way for potential customers
container2.paragraph: Applicants seeking a sales position with us should have the following qualifications and experience
container2.sub2: Basic experience in an online sales or similar sales experience (preferred)
container2.sub3: Access to a computer with a strong internet connection (required)
container2.sub4: Be at least 16 years of age or older (required)

apply.paragraph: Interested in a Career with Hosting HQ? Complete this application and we will review your application for a career opportunity with us. (Please submit application in ENGLISH)

fields.name: NAME
fields.experience.placeholder: Describe any experience you feel should be included (Max 1000 Characters)
